General.Name: The Phoenix Mills Limited
General.Description: The Phoenix Mills Limited engages in the operation and management of malls, construction of commercial and residential properties, and hotel business in India. The company operates in two segments, Property and Related Services, and Hospitality. Its real estate asset portfolio consists of retail mall, commercial office, residential, and hospitality projects located in Mumbai, Chennai, Bengaluru, Pune, Kolkata, Lucknow, Bareilly, Agra, Ahmedabad, and Indore. The company owns and operates hotels under The St. Regis name and various restaurants in Mumbai; and Courtyard by Marriott brand name and various restaurants in Agra. It operates malls primarily under the Phoenix MarketCity, Phoenix Palladium, Phoenix United, and Phoenix Palassio brand names. The company was incorporated in 1905 and is based in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: R. R. Hosiery Building, Mumbai, India, 400011
